exterior.title: Deck Renovation
exterior.description: Enhance the existing deck by replacing worn-out boards, adding a fresh coat of weather-resistant paint, and installing modern railings. This will improve the outdoor living space and increase the property's appeal.

exterior.title: Landscaping and Garden Design
exterior.description: Revamp the front and backyard with new plants, shrubs, and a small garden area. This will enhance curb appeal and create a welcoming environment.

exterior.title: Exterior Painting
exterior.description: Repaint the exterior of the house to give it a fresh and modern look. Choose neutral colors to appeal to a wide range of buyers.

exterior.title: Driveway Resurfacing
exterior.description: Resurface the driveway to improve its appearance and functionality. This will enhance the overall look of the property.

exterior.title: Roof Repair and Insulation
exterior.description: Repair any damaged areas of the roof and add insulation to improve energy efficiency. This is crucial for maintaining the property's value and appeal.

living area.title: Floor Refinishing
living area.description: Refinish the hardwood floors to restore their original shine and remove any scratches or wear. This will enhance the overall appearance of the living space and increase the property's value.

living area.title: Paint Refresh
living area.description: Apply a fresh coat of paint to the walls and trim in neutral colors to modernize the space and make it more appealing to potential buyers.

living area.title: Lighting Upgrade
living area.description: Replace outdated light fixtures with modern, energy-efficient options to improve the ambiance and functionality of the living area.

living area.title: Fireplace Update
living area.description: Update the fireplace with a new mantel and surround to create a focal point in the living room, enhancing both aesthetics and value.

living area.title: Window Treatments
living area.description: Install new window treatments such as blinds or curtains to improve privacy and energy efficiency while adding a touch of style.

other.title: Entryway Update
other.description: Enhance the entryway with fresh paint, updated lighting fixtures, and a modern door handle. This will create a welcoming first impression and improve the overall aesthetic of the home.

other.title: Staircase Refinishing
other.description: Refinish the wooden staircase to restore its original beauty. This includes sanding, staining, and sealing the wood to enhance durability and appearance.

other.title: Hallway Lighting Upgrade
other.description: Install modern, energy-efficient lighting in the hallway to brighten the space and reduce energy costs. This simple upgrade can significantly enhance the ambiance of the home.

kitchen.title: Upgrade Kitchen Appliances
kitchen.description: Replace outdated appliances with energy-efficient models. This includes the refrigerator, stove, and dishwasher. Modern appliances can significantly enhance the kitchen's appeal and energy efficiency.

kitchen.title: Install Under-Cabinet Lighting
kitchen.description: Add LED under-cabinet lighting to improve the kitchen's ambiance and functionality. This is a cost-effective way to modernize the space and make it more appealing to potential buyers.

kitchen.title: Replace Countertops
kitchen.description: Upgrade the countertops to quartz or granite for a more modern and luxurious look. This can greatly enhance the kitchen's aesthetic and increase property value.

kitchen.title: Update Cabinet Hardware
kitchen.description: Replace the cabinet handles and knobs with modern designs. This simple update can refresh the kitchen's look without a full renovation.

kitchen.title: Refinish Cabinets
kitchen.description: Refinish the existing cabinets with a fresh coat of paint or stain. This can give the kitchen a new look without the cost of replacing the cabinets entirely.

bedroom.title: Paint and Accent Walls
bedroom.description: Repaint the bedrooms with neutral colors to appeal to a broader audience. Consider adding an accent wall with a modern texture or wallpaper to add character.

bedroom.title: Flooring Upgrade
bedroom.description: Replace the existing flooring with hardwood or high-quality laminate to enhance the aesthetic appeal and durability of the bedrooms.

bedroom.title: Lighting and Ceiling Fan Update
bedroom.description: Install modern lighting fixtures and replace outdated ceiling fans to improve the ambiance and energy efficiency of the bedrooms.

bedroom.title: Closet Organization Systems
bedroom.description: Install custom closet organization systems to maximize storage space and improve functionality.

bedroom.title: Window Treatments
bedroom.description: Update window treatments with modern blinds or curtains to enhance privacy and style.

bath.title: Vanity and Countertop Upgrade
bath.description: Replace the existing vanity and countertop with a modern design. Opt for a quartz or granite countertop and a sleek, contemporary vanity to enhance the bathroom's appeal.

bath.title: Lighting Upgrade
bath.description: Install modern, energy-efficient LED lighting fixtures to brighten up the space and add a touch of elegance. Consider adding a dimmer switch for adjustable lighting.

bath.title: Paint and Wall Treatment
bath.description: Repaint the bathroom with a fresh, neutral color to make it feel more spacious and inviting. Consider adding a feature wall with wallpaper or a textured finish.

bath.title: Flooring Replacement
bath.description: Replace the existing floor with modern, water-resistant vinyl or ceramic tiles. This will update the look and improve durability.

bath.title: Showerhead and Faucet Upgrade
bath.description: Replace the showerhead and faucet with modern, water-saving fixtures. This not only updates the look but also improves water efficiency.

unfinished basement.title: Basement Finishing
unfinished basement.description: Transform the unfinished basement into a livable space by adding drywall, flooring, and lighting. This can include creating a family room or additional bedroom, which adds significant value to the property.

unfinished basement.title: Basement Bathroom Addition
unfinished basement.description: Add a bathroom to the basement to increase functionality and appeal. This involves plumbing work, installing fixtures, and tiling.

unfinished basement.title: Basement Insulation
unfinished basement.description: Improve energy efficiency by insulating the basement walls and ceiling. This can help reduce heating costs and make the space more comfortable.

unfinished basement.title: Basement Waterproofing
unfinished basement.description: Seal any cracks and apply waterproofing paint to prevent moisture issues. This is essential for maintaining the integrity of the basement space.

unfinished basement.title: Basement Egress Window Installation
unfinished basement.description: Install an egress window to meet building codes for a legal bedroom. This also adds natural light and safety to the basement.
